steps.title: Order a McDouble and a McChicken.
steps.content: Order a McDouble and a McChicken. If you want anything else like fries or a drink, order that too.

steps.title: Wait for them to make it.
steps.content: Wait for them to make it.

steps.title: Open the McDouble separating the 2 beef patties.
steps.content: Open the McDouble separating the 2 beef patties.

steps.title: Put the entire McChicken, bun and all, in between the two patties of the McDouble.
steps.content: Put the entire McChicken, bun and all, in between the two patties of the McDouble.

steps.title: Close it up again so that its one really thick sandwich.
steps.content: Close it up again so that its one really thick sandwich.
